Article.ArticleTitle: Exploring predictors of COVID-19 precautionary behaviors during the initial rollout of COVID-19 vaccines in a predominately Hispanic sample.

Abstract.AbstractText: •Precautionary behaviors were lower if primary language in household was Spanish.•Testing positive for COVID-19 was inversely associated with precautionary behaviors.•Healthcare practitioners were the most trusted source of COVID-19 information.
